lead_paragraph: It has been a rough start to the season for star running backs. Only one of the top five rushers from last season, the Rams’ Steven Jackson, is in the top 20 in rushing yards this year. But receivers are more than making up for it. There have been 36 100-yard receiving games this season, compared with 24 100-yard rushing games.
